modules.title: exec highlight spectra hooverd in the table

modules.richtext:
Choose the multiblock PCA model to display by selecting relevant row in the “model selector” table.  Scores and loadings will be displayed. Change PCs scores and loadings to be displayed using the button on the scores and loadings section. The loading will be displayed on the top panel of the “spectra displayer”

 

To perform STOCY

Select spectra in the PCA scores plot using lasso tool (Alt-Draw for PC or option for Mac).  The selected data will be displayed in the “selected data” section (panel on the left).   

 

Use shift+ control to select multiple rows from “selected data” and these spectra will be displayed on the bottom panel of the “spectra displayer”. 

Navigate the “spectra displayer” using mouse.  To zoom into the spectra region of interest using the mouse to drag across the region of interest and left click or to zoom out by double click.   

 

To select the STOCSY driver peak, use Alt+Key and right click for PC or option and right click for Mac. 

Press “calculate STOSCY” and the correlation plot will be displayed in the middle section of the “spectra displayer”.
